adverb: elaborate expression (4 syllables; 1st and 3rd, or 2nd and 4th are the same)
left relative clause plus head noun
prefixable morpheme (may be preceded by ɔ̀-)
deverbal noun (derived from a clause containing only a VP)
head of a relative clause; relative-clause head
head noun modified by a right relative clause N\textsubscript{rh} + RRC
numeral plus classifier; quantity expression (equivalent to ``Q``)
unrestricted particle (can follow either noun or verb)
universal unrestricted particle + universal unrestricted particle
numeral plus classifier; quantity expression (eqiuvalent to ``Num + Clf'')
quasi-elaborate expression (4 syllables but none repeated)
pre-head versatile verb + main verb (pre-head concatenation)
main verb plus post-head versatile verb (post-head concatenation)
